title: Christmas gift from Riot Games?
body: Riot Games should give us all a free random champion and/or skin for Christmas

replies.body: Giving a free random champion or skin away would make it unfair for all the players who have made purchases in the game. Especially in the eyes of a collector who may or may not already own everything in the game.
that is just like putting a 1350 rp skin on sale, scrubs get it so much cheaper {{item:3070}}
insulting the very idea of a sale in general is probably one of the stupidest things i've seen on the boards so far
Yea why not make a christmass icon for us is cool
they haven't done it before, why start now.
because the LoL community will start a protest which involves everyone ditching the game if they don't.
